updates.title: Google launches AI-powered Maps tools that automatically generate code for interactive mapping projects, targeting developers and creative professionals.
OpenAI's Sora video AI app hits nearly 500,000 Android installs on first day, making it 4x larger than iOS launch with massive adoption among creators.
Amazon debuts AI-powered Kindle Translate service for e-book authors, enabling automatic translation to expand global reach of digital content.
Meta expands AI-generated short video feed 'Vibes' to Europe, with media generation in Meta AI app jumping 10x since launch, raising concerns about AI content flooding social platforms.
Amazon's 'House of David' season 2 uses over 350 AI-generated shots including battle scenes, representing 4x increase from previous season as entertainment industry embraces AI production tools.
